data.title: Iran Current Time
data.meta_description: Current local time in Iran with information about Iran time zones and daylight saving time.
data.text:
The Current Time in

Iran is:

Thursday

8/29/2024

7:23 PM

UTC+03:30

Iran

Standard Time is

UTC/GMT + 3.30

During Daylight Saving Time Iran is

UTC/GMT + 4:30

Time Zone

Abbreviations

Iran Standard Time - is abbreviated as IRST (Iran Standard Time)

Iran Daylight Saving Time - is abbreviated as IRDT (Iran Summer Time)

UTC - GMT

Offset

Iran is GMT/UTC + 3:30h during Standard Time

Iran is GMT/UTC + 4:30h during Daylight Saving Time
